meta.title: SkillVal | AI-Powered Technical Assessment Platform for Developers
meta.description: Validate technical skills of developers with AI. Objective and efficient assessments for recruitment and talent development.

hero.title: Less work, more flow, more safety
hero.subtitle: SkillVal: The platform that validates skills and adds value to careers
hero.description: SkillVal empowers professionals and organizations to identify and validate skills through EVC processes and skill reports. From goals to results, our platform keeps you focused on what truly matters: growth and development.

workflow.title: Awesome workflow
workflow.description: Skill validation platform organizations use to focus on identifying, validating, and leveraging skills that drive growth and success.

collaboration.title: Collaborate with team
collaboration.description: Skill validation platform that connects mentors, assessors, EVC providers, and employers to collaborate effectively and stay focused on skill development, validation, and career growth.

security.title: AI and Human Validation to prevent fraud
security.description: AI and Human Validation working together to prevent fraud and ensure trust in skill assessments.

powerful.title: Easy to learn and extremely powerful
powerful.description: SkillVal simplifies skill validation while empowering teams to achieve their goals and drive meaningful progress.

validation.title: For validation of every skill
validation.description: Whether through EVC processes or detailed skill reports, SkillVal ensures accurate recognition of competencies. Empower individuals and organizations with trusted assessments for every career stage.

audit.title: For Audit Companies
audit.subtitle: Ensure Compliance with Confidence
audit.description: Reliable reports and insights to make audits simple and transparent.

assessors.title: For Assessors
assessors.subtitle: Effortless Skill Assessment
assessors.description: Everything you need to evaluate skills fairly, accurately, and efficiently.

evc.title: For EVC Providers
evc.subtitle: Streamline Your EVC Processes
evc.description: Simple tools to manage pathways, guide candidates, and validate results with ease.

comingSoon.title: SkillVal Coming soon
comingSoon.description: SkillVal is almost here! Be ready to validate skills and empower growth like never before.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe for updates
newsletter.description: Join our waitlist to receive updates about SkillVal
